title: NAMING SYSTEMS :: -ica and other HELVETICA SPAWN
content:
Helvetica spawn?   
I've always enjoyed -ica named typefaces. Anyone else? I thought we'd build an -ica repository, our little gift of typographica for type designers who can't think of a proper name. The names would be donated so if you have killer -ica names you want to keep, don't post them here.   
   
:: so post some -ica names already in existence.   
helvetica   
poetica   
syncratica (Ole)   
   
:: or some based on -ic words.   
cryptica   
gothica   
graphica   
neurotica   
generica   
synthetica   
eccentrica   
statica   
plastica   
simplistica   
   
:: or some that are musica-related   
elastica   
plasmatica   
popmusica   
harmonica   
   
   
:: or others that are headpoppers   
typopica   
dressuppica   
serifica   
jetsettica   
centrifica   
ponchandjohnica   
   
:: or others with hidden meanings   
ovonica   
   
:: or whatever else
author: beejay
